Trigger.name: Dart
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Sharply extending out your arms in front of you, (you) deliver a lightning-fast thrust to the .+? of (.+) with .+\.$
^Spinning on one foot (you) bring .+ around in a lightning fast thrust at the .+? of (.+)\.$
^Snapping \w+ arms out in front of her, (\w+) delivers a lightning-fast thrust to the .+? of (.+) with .+\.$
^Spinning on one foot (\w+) brings .+ around in a lightning-fast thrust at the .+? of (.+)\,$
